description: TEHRAN – Iran national football team are places in Pot 2 of the 2026 FIFA World Cup draw.
title: Iran in Pot 2 for 2026 FIFA World Cup draw

description: TEHRAN - Sepahan scored late to defeat Al Hussein 2-0 in their AFC Champions League Two 2025/26 Group C tie on Tuesday.
title: Sepahan defeat Al Hussain in AFC Champions League Two 2025/26

description: Serbia’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued a statement on November 20, rejecting recent foreign media reports alleging President Aleksandar Vu?i?’s involvement in wartime events in Bosnia. The ministry described the claims, including references to “human safaris” during the Sarajevo siege, as unfounded and stressed that no tribunal has ever linked Vucic to war crimes. The following is the full statement as published by the ministry:
title: Serbia’s MFA rejects 'fabricated narratives' of ‘human safaris’ in Sarajevo siege

description: SOUTH LEBANON—Hezbollah has never fought from a position of conventional parity. It has always confronted an enemy with overwhelming technological capacity, vast intelligence resources, and near-limitless Western backing. Yet history established a stubborn truth: despite asymmetry, the Zionist enemy failed repeatedly to convert its intelligence superiority into decisive victory or reoccupation.
title: Hezbollah’s shadow war: Reshaping the battlefield before the fight

description:
TEHRAN – Despite Trump’s much?touted Gaza truce announced on October 10, Israel continues to restrict essential lifelines for Palestinians in Gaza.
The occupying Israeli regime’s continued airstrikes, bombardment, and tightening blockade are deepening a humanitarian collapse across the Gaza Strip, where survival is becoming increasingly untenable despite the declared truce.
title: Gaza strangled despite “truce deal”

description: TEHRAN – The Gaza Humanitarian Foundation (GHF), a controversial U.S. and Israeli-backed aid scheme that sidelined the UN and used armed American contractors, was permanently shut down on November 24.
title: Baited with bread, butchered by bullets

description: TEHRAN – The Thirtieth Session of the Conference of the States Parties to the Chemical Weapons Convention (CSP30), which opened on February 24, is meant to symbolize international cooperation against the scourge of chemical weapons. Delegates gather to reaffirm collective responsibility, transparency, and the shared determination to prevent the horrors of WMD use.
title: The protected criminal syndicate

description: TEHRAN- The 20th edition of the Saqqez International Kurdish Theater Festival will be held with a focus on the Kurdish language and indigenous customs, the organizers have announced.
title: Saqqez Kurdish Theater Festival to showcase indigenous culture

description: TEHRAN- Iran National Orchestra, conducted by Homayoun Rahimian, will present its latest concert titled “Now It Has Reached Our Ears…” over two nights on December 7 and 8 at Tehran’s Vahdat Hall.
title: Iran National Orchestra to perform in Vahdat Hall

description: TEHRAN – Iranian short film “Sheep,” written, directed, and produced by Hadi Babaeifar, won a prize at the 11th annual Asian World Film Festival (AWFF), which was held in California, the U.S.
title: Iranian short film “Sheep” wins at Asian World Film Festival

description: TEHRAN- Two new cultural and artistic centers along with a cinema hall of Iran's Institute for Intellectual Development of Children and Young Adults – Kanoon are set to open simultaneously on November 30, coinciding with the Persian Gulf Trio Islands National Day.
title: New cultural facilities to open on Iran’s strategic islands, enhancing youth engagement

description: TEHRAN – The 19th Iran International Documentary Film Festival “Cinema Verite” has announced the line-up for the Gaza Competition section.
title: 19th Cinema Verite reveals line-up for Gaza Competition section

description: TEHRAN – Brigadier General Kioumars Heidari has been appointed acting commander of the Khatam al-Anbiya Central Headquarters, replacing Major General Hossein Hassani.
title: Brig. Gen. Kioumars Heidari named second-in-command of Khatam al-Anbiya Unit

description: TEHRAN – Pakistan’s President Asif Ali Zardari, in a meeting with Ali Larijani, Secretary of Iran’s Supreme National Security Council, reaffirmed his country’s solidarity with the Islamic Republic of Iran against the aggression of the Israeli regime.
title: Pakistan pledges diplomatic backing for Iran during top security official’s visit to Islamabad

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Press TV has officially launched its Hebrew-language service to reach a wider audience worldwide.
title: Press TV launches Hebrew-language service

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Parliament Speaker Mohammad-Baqer Qalibaf on Tuesday denounced the Israeli regime’s “aggressive hand” in the region, calling for decisive action to halt Tel Aviv’s ongoing policy of “borderless crime.”
title: Stop Israel’s ‘borderless crime’: Iran Parliament speaker

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) says it has dismantled a terrorist team in the southeastern Iranian province of Sistan and Baluchestan.
title: IRGC forces bust terror group in southeast Iran

description: TEHRAN - Arman-e-Melli analyzed the uncertain state of talks between Iran and the United States.
title: It is essential that Iran and US reset diplomacy

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi on Tuesday condemned Israel for remaining outside chemical weapons disarmament treaties, calling it the main obstacle to regional stability.
title: Israel’s non-adherence to CWC threatens regional stability: FM Araghchi

description: TEHRAN – The commander of the Naval Force of the Iranian Army says new equipment will be unveiled and join the Army’s naval fleet in the coming days.
title: Iranian Navy to unveil new equipment in coming days: Navy commander

description: TEHRAN – Haitham Ali Tabatabai, a senior commander of Hezbollah in Lebanon, was assassinated and martyred on November 23 during an Israeli airstrike on southern Dahieh in Beirut, along with several of his comrades.
title: A ceasefire in name only

description: TEHRAN - Iran were dealt a tough opening defeat as they fell 4-1 to Brazil in the 2025 FIFA Futsal Women’s World Cup, and they want to beat Panama to keep their hopes alive.
title: Iran determined to rebound against Panama

description: Venezuelan Foreign Minister Iván Gil on Tuesday launched a scathing attack on Israeli Foreign Minister Gideon Sa’ar, branding him a “war criminal” and “perpetrator of genocide” who, he insisted, will eventually face international justice.
title: Venezuelan FM brands Israeli counterpart a ‘perpetrator of genocide’

description: Brazil's Supreme Court unanimously upheld the preemptive arrest of former President Jair Bolsonaro on Monday, following his attempt to remove his electronic ankle bracelet over the weekend using a soldering iron while under house arrest, Anadolu reported Tuesday.
title: Brazil’s top court rules unanimously to keep Bolsonaro in custody

description: Thousands of Alawites took to the streets in protest across Syria’s coastal cities on November 25 to demonstrate against government-sponsored sectarian violence, one day after the minority’s religious leader called for mass sit-ins, The Cradle reported Tuesday.
title: Alawites rise in mass protests against sectarian violence in Syria

description: U.S. Army Secretary Dan Driscoll shuttled between Russian and Ukrainian delegations in Abu Dhabi this week, reportedly pressing a peace framework that would slash Kyiv’s military to 800,000 troops—a concession that has intensified fears across Europe that Washington is trading Ukraine’s long-term security for a quick diplomatic win.
title: U.S. presses Ukraine to accept troop cuts in Abu Dhabi talks

description: TEHRAN – A media tour in Semnan province on Wednesday took journalists to five historic and cultural sites, offering an overview of the city’s architectural heritage and preservation efforts, IRNA reported.
title: Media tour explores historic sites across Semnan province

description: TEHRAN - Ardabil province is set to present 112 investment opportunities in tourism, handicrafts and related services at an international on Thursday, a provincial official said.
title: Ardabil to present over 100 tourism investment opportunities at intl. forum

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Sistan-Baluchestan province is set to hold a special conference on desert attractions for hikers on Nov. 27–28.
title: Sistan-Baluchestan to host conference dedicated to desert hiking

description: TEHRAN--Iranian Ambassador to Tajikistan Alireza Haqiqian emphasized the need to design a sustainable framework for joint cooperation and the development of medical tourism with Tajikistan.
title: Iranian ambassador emphasizes promoting medical tourism with Tajikistan

description: TEHRAN – The National Museum of Iran is scheduled to hold a national conference on human living spaces on Feb. 15, 2026.
title: National Museum to host conference on human living spaces

description: TEHRAN – Conservation teams in the UNESCO-registered Susa have completed a project to safeguard and protect 253 architectural remains from the Achaemenid-era Apadana Palace, the head of the Susa World Heritage base said on Tuesday.
title: UNESCO-listed Susa completes protection work on 253 Apadana Palace remains

description: Alanya, a coastal city in Turkey, is rapidly emerging as a hotspot for international investors. Unlike saturated markets like Dubai and Cyprus, Alanya offers economic stability, steady construction growth, and transparent regulations for foreign property ownership and residency.
title: Why Are Investors in 2025 Moving from Dubai and Cyprus to Alanya, Turkey?

description: Sudan’s paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) fighters are committing war crimes in the Darfur town of el-Fasher, the rights group Amnesty International has alleged in a new report, according to Al Jazeera.
title: Sudan's RSF committed rape and summary executions in el-Fasher: Amnesty

description: TEHRAN – The head of the Iranian parliament’s environment fraction, Somayeh Rafiei, has underlined paying special attention to endemic and native plant species and implementing plant diversity conservation projects in the country.
title: MP underscores conservation of native, endemic plant species

description: TEHRAN – Some 100 participants from 25 countries are participating in the final stage of the Rayan international artificial intelligence (AI) and programming contest, titled World Finals, which is being held on-site in Tehran from November 25 to 29.
title: 25 countries attending Rayan intl. AI, programming contest

description: TEHRAN – The head of the Ministry of Science, Research and Technology’s center for international scientific cooperation, Farhad Yazdandoost, and the Indonesian Ambassador to Iran, Roliansyah Sumirat, have discussed ways to enhance research, educational, and cultural collaborations between Iran and Indonesia.
title: Tehran, Jakarta to foster scientific cooperation

description: Convicted spy for Israel Jonathan Pollard claimed he was raped by U.S. interrogators while in custody, The Cradle reported Tuesday.
title: Convicted Israeli spy Pollard alleges rape by U.S. interrogators during custody

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s delegation finished in ninth place at the 25th Summer Deaflympics (XXV Summer Deaflympics).
title: Iran come ninth at 2025 Deaflympics

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s minister of industry, mining, and trade traveled to Turkey to participate in the meeting of ministers from member countries of the Economic Cooperation Organization (ECO), which is being held at the ministerial level for the first time in 20 years.
title: Iranian minister leaves Tehran for Istanbul to attend ECO ministerial meeting

description: TEHRAN- Iran produced 12.708 million tons of steel products in the first seven months of the current Iranian calendar year (September 23-October 22), Iranian Steel Producers Association (ISPA) announced.
title: Iran produces 12.7m tons of steel products in 7 months

description: TEHRAN- The governor-general of Kerman province stated that the province holds the first rank in the implementation of solar projects in the country, adding: "Currently, more than 8,000 megawatts of solar power plants have been implemented in the province."
title: Kerman leading province in launching solar power plants

description: TEHRAN- The head of the Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines, and Agriculture (ICCIMA) considered free zones as the best platform for an investment leap and emphasized that these zones are an important advantage for attracting investors.
title: Free zones; an important advantage for attracting investors: ICCIMA head
